Posts.Content: Hi katinthemiddle, I don't really know about the bad effect of DCIS. However, it is good to do the mammography annually. I'm so glad to hear that you will do it each year. This really help to reduce the risk of breast cancer. You really concern about your health!
Posts.Title: Reduction in breast size after opeeration for DCIS

Posts.Content: There are a lot of cancer treatments available to treat the breast cancer. The most common way is to use Tamoxifen drug to treat the cancer. Chemotherapy is another way to treat breast cancer too. Before having any treatment, it is better for you to stay optimist and happy. Smile always can really help you to prevent the cancer cells from spread. May you be healthy and happy always!
Posts.Title: Need opinions on what type of treatment you think I may have to do
